import { useRef } from 'react' import '../css/Classroom.css' import { openClassroom, closeClassroom } from '../service/classroom_access_service' import { buildClassSetting } from '../service/class_setting_service' function ClassForm(props) { const classroomWs = props.classroomWs const classroomNameRef = useRef(null) const classroomDescRef = useRef(null) const classroomTimeRef = useRef(null) const startClassHandler = () => { const classSetting = buildClassSetting(classroomNameRef.current.value, classroomDescRef.current.value, classroomTimeRef.current.value) openClassroom(classroomWs, classSetting) } const closeClassHandler = () => { closeClassroom(classroomWs) } return (

開啟教室：

event.preventDefault()}> 教室名稱：

教室簡介：




) } export default ClassForm
